org.graphity.client.model

Class GlobalResourceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResourceBase
      • org.graphity.server.model.QueriedResourceBase
        • org.graphity.processor.model.ResourceBase
          • org.graphity.client.model.ResourceBase
            • org.graphity.client.model.GlobalResourceBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.FrontsNode, com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.OntResource, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource, PageResource, org.graphity.server.model.LDPResource, org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResource, org.graphity.server.model.QueriedResource

    public class GlobalResourceBase
extends ResourceBase
    Resource that can publish Linked Data and (X)HTML as well as load RDF from remote sources. The remote datasources can either be native-RDF Linked Data, or formats supported by Locators (for example, Atom XML transformed to RDF/XML using GRDDL XSLT stylesheet). The ability to load remote RDF data is crucial for generic Linked Data browser functionality. Supports pagination on containers (implemented using SPARQL query solution modifiers).
    Author:
    Martynas Juseviƒçius
    See Also:
    LinkedDataResourceBase, LocatorLinkedData, 15 Solution Sequences and Modifiers

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlobalResourceBase

        public GlobalResourceBase(@Context
                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                  @Context
                  javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                  @Context
                  javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders httpHeaders,
                  @Context
                  com.sun.jersey.api.core.ResourceConfig resourceConfig,
                  @Context
                  com.hp.hpl.jena.ontology.OntModel sitemap,
                  @Context
                  org.graphity.server.model.SPARQLEndpoint endpoint,
                  Long limit,
                  Long offset,
                  String orderBy,
                  Boolean desc,
                  URI graphURI,
                  URI mode,
                  URI topicURI,
                  javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType)
        JAX-RS compatible resource constructor with injected initialization objects. The URI of the resource being created is the current request URI (note: this is different from Server). The sitemap ontology model and the SPARQL endpoint resource are injected via JAX-RS providers.
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - URI information of the current request
        request - current request
        httpHeaders - HTTP headers of the current request
        resourceConfig - webapp configuration
        sitemap - sitemap ontology
        endpoint - active SPARQL endpoint (used to execute queries)
        limit - pagination LIMIT ("limit" query string param)
        offset - pagination OFFSET ("offset" query string param)
        orderBy - pagination ORDER BY variable name ("order-by" query string param)
        desc - pagination DESC value ("desc" query string param)
        mode - "mode" query string param
        topicURI - remote URI to be loaded ("uri" query string param)
        mediaType - media type of the representation ("accept" query string param)
        See Also:
        OntologyProvider, SPARQLEndpointProvider

      • GlobalResourceBase

        protected GlobalResourceBase(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                  javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                  javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders httpHeaders,
                  com.sun.jersey.api.core.ResourceConfig resourceConfig,

                  Long offset,
                  String orderBy,
                  Boolean desc,
                  URI graphURI,
                  URI mode,
                  URI topicURI,
                  javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType)
        Protected constructor. Not suitable for JAX-RS but can be used when subclassing.
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - URI information of the request
        request - current request
        httpHeaders - HTTP headers of current request
        resourceConfig - webapp configuration
        ontResource - this resource as RDF resource
        endpoint - SPARQL endpoint of this resource
        limit - pagination LIMIT
        offset - pagination OFFSET
        orderBy - pagination ORDER BY variable name
        desc - pagination DESC value
        mode - "mode" query string param
        topicURI - remote URI to be loaded
        mediaType - media type of the representation

      • get

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response get()
        Handles GET request and returns response with RDF description of this or remotely loaded resource. If "uri" query string parameter is present, resource is loaded from the specified remote URI and its RDF representation is returned. Otherwise, local resource with request URI is used. If "accept" query string parameter is present, the specified media type is used to serialize RDF representation. Otherwise, normal content negotiation is used.
        Specified by:
        get in interface org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResource
        Overrides:
        get in class ResourceBase
        Returns:
